io.github.rowak.nanoleafapi

Class PluginOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.rowak.nanoleafapi.PluginOptions

  • public class PluginOptions
extends java.lang.Object
    A local interface for the plugin options belonging to a plugin. Setter methods in this class will not have an effect on the Aurora.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PluginOptions()
      Creates a blank plugin options object.

    • Method Summary

      • fromJSON

        public static PluginOptions fromJSON(java.lang.String json)
        Parse the PluginOptions data from the raw JSON data into a new PluginOptions object.
        Parameters:
        json - the JSON data to convert
        Returns:
        a new PluginOptions object equivalent to the JSON data

      • toJSON

        public java.lang.String toJSON()
        Properly convert a pluginoptions object to JSON format.
        Returns:
        the pluginoptions in JSON format

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Converts a plugin options object to JSON format.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        the plugin options in JSON format

      • getProperties

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.Object,java.lang.Object> getProperties()
        Gets a map of properties belonging to this plugin options object.
        Returns:
        the properties of this plugin options object

      • getTransTime

        public int getTransTime()
        Gets the transition time for this plugin options object. This option indicates the time it takes to go from one palette color to another, in tenths of a second.
        Returns:
        the transition time

      • setTransTime

        public void setTransTime(int transTime)
        Sets the transition time for this plugin options object. This option indicates the time it takes to go from one palette color to another, in tenths of a second.
        Parameters:
        transTime - the transition time

      • loop

        public boolean loop()
        Checks if loop is enabled for this plugin options object.
        Returns:
        true, if loop is enabled and false if loop is disabled or unset

      • setLoop

        public void setLoop(boolean loop)
        Sets if loop is enabled for this plugin options object.
        Parameters:
        loop - whether loop should be enabled or not

      • getLinearDirection

        public java.lang.String getLinearDirection()
        Gets the linear direction for this plugin options object. This option will be one of: "left", "right", "up", or "down".
        Returns:
        the linear direction

      • setLinearDirection

        public void setLinearDirection(java.lang.String direction)
        Sets the linear direction for this plugin options object. This option must be one of: "left", "right", "up", or "down".
        Parameters:
        direction - the linear direction

      • getRadialDirection

        public java.lang.String getRadialDirection()
        Gets the radial direction based on the layout center.
        Returns:
        the radial direction

      • setRadialDirection

        public void setRadialDirection(java.lang.String direction)
        Sets the radial direction based on the layout center.
        Parameters:
        direction - the radial direction

      • getRotationalDirection

        public java.lang.String getRotationalDirection()
        Gets the rotational/circular direction around the layout center. This option will be one of: "cw" or "ccw", where "cw" is clockwise and "ccw" is counterclockwise.
        Returns:
        the rotational direction

      • setRotationDirection

        public void setRotationDirection(java.lang.String direction)
        Sets the rotational/circular direction around the layout center. This option must be one of: "cw" or "ccw", where "cw" is clockwise and "ccw" is counterclockwise.
        Parameters:
        direction - the rotational direction

      • getDelayTime

        public int getDelayTime()
        Gets the delay time for this plugin options object. This option indicates how long the plugin will dwell on a palette color, in tenths of a second.
        Returns:
        the delay time

      • setDelayTime

        public void setDelayTime(int delayTime)
        Sets the delay time for this plugin options object. This option indicates how long the plugin will dwell on a palette color, in tenths of a second.
        Parameters:
        delayTime - the delay time

      • getNumColorsPerFrame

        public int getNumColorsPerFrame()
        Gets the modifier that indicates how much of a palette is shown on the layout. The limit for this option is 50.
        Returns:
        the number of colors shown per frame

      • setNumColorsPerFrame

        public void setNumColorsPerFrame(int nColorsPerFrame)
        Sets the modifier that indicates how much of a palette is shown on the layout. The limit for this option is 50.
        Parameters:
        nColorsPerFrame - the number of colors shown per frame

      • getMainColorProbability

        public double getMainColorProbability()
        Gets the probability of the background color being used.
        Returns:
        the probability of showing the background color

      • setMainColorProbability

        public void setMainColorProbability(double probability)
        Sets the probability of the background color being used.
        Parameters:
        probability - the probability of showing the background color
